sources.title: Woman In Brown
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Woman In Brown (1948) W. LEE WILDER
sources.description:
Stars: Conrad Nagel, Fritz Kortner, Reinhold Sch√ºnzel
Director: W. Lee Wilder

In Hungary, a rich baron discovers that there are extensive oil deposits underneath nearby properties owned by villagers. He manages to convince all the property owners to sell to him, except for a few properties owned by Jewish families. Infuriated at their refusal to sell to him, he attempts, with the help of some corrupt local police, to have the men charged with the murder of a local woman, who in reality actually committed suicide. Also known as THE VICIOUS CIRCLE.
